sentences: Radistid olid keskuses ööpäev läbi kuuldel.
context: The word 'kuuldele' in Estonian is part of compound words related to hearing or listening. From the dictionary entry, it appears as a component in words like 'kuuldekaugus' (hearing distance). It's also used in the instrumental case and allative case forms of the verb 'kuulima' (to listen/hear). In the example provided, it shows usage where operators were listening around the clock at the center.
